effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user strikes everything around it by stomping
down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of
those hit.

and attacks everything in the area. Hit
